author: Austin Evans
description:
Power up your holidays with the all-new @EcoFlowTech RIVER 3 Plus UPS Portable Power Station. Preorder now starting at $209, get an extra 5% off with code 24EFR3PAUS, plus a FREE 45W Solar Panel until Dec 27th (benefit US Only)
EcoFlow Website: https://bit.ly/4icMo0w
EcoFlow Amazon: https://amzn.to/4f9c0cg

Check out EcoFlow Holiday Deals and get 5% off on other products with code 24EFXMASAUS (except flash sale products and recommended accessories) valid until Dec 27th: https://bit.ly/3ZlHwir 

In what started as a simple showcase of the EcoFlow RIVER 3 Plus turned into an intense challenge where I had to complete multiple Fortnite tasks before my PS5 Pro ran out of battery power. Between hunting down mythical sprites, defeating bosses, and getting eliminations - all while my colleagues kept trying to drain my precious battery life - this turned into one of the most stressful gaming sessions I've ever recorded.

Subscribe for more! https://www.youtube.com/austinevans
TikTok: https://
title: The PS5 Pro is on a TIMER 😬
